# removeLast(_:)

**Instance Method**

Remove the last N elements of this span, returning the memory they occupy to the uninitialized state.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func removeLast(_ k: Int)
```

## Discussion

`n` must not be greater than `count`
title: removeLast(_:)
